title: Average Weekly Earnings, Manufacturing, Nondurable Goods for United States
notes:
Source: Bureau Of Labor Statistics, For 1923-1950 Data: Bls Mimeographed Release Ls53-2890, "Employment, Hours, And Earnings", February 1923; For 1951-1954: Bls Release Of May 1955; Thereafter: Monthly Labor Review.

This NBER data series m08287 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.
